org.gradle.api.file

Interface DirectoryVar

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DirectoryProperty, Property<Directory>, PropertyState<Directory>, Provider<Directory>
    Deprecated. 
    Use DirectoryProperty instead.

    @Incubating
@Deprecated
public interface DirectoryVar
extends DirectoryProperty, PropertyState<Directory>
    Represents some configurable directory location, whose value is mutable and is not necessarily currently known until later.

    Note: This interface is not intended for implementation by build script or plugin authors. An instance of this class can be created using the ProjectLayout.newDirectoryVar() method.

    Since:
    4.1

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.api.file.DirectoryProperty

        dir, dir, file, file, getAsFile, getAsFileTree, set

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.api.provider.Property

        set, set

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.api.provider.Provider

        get, getOrElse, getOrNull, isPresent, map
